name: True Damage
description: Add 1 damage to any Technique.
op_1_desc: Add 1 additional damage.

name: Reaction
description: 25% EN: This technique uses a Basic (or other) reaction instead of action.

name: Long Action
description: -12.5% EN: This technique uses a 3 Action Point Long Action.
op_1_desc: -25% EN: This technique uses a 4 Action Point Long Action.

name: Quick or Free Action
description: 25% EN: This technique uses a quick action to activate instead of a basic action.
op_1_desc: 50% EN: This technique uses a free action to activate instead of a basic action

name: Split Damage Dice
description: A "Split" damage dice is when dice could be represented by less dice of greater size, but are "split" into smaller sizes instead. Ie 2d6 instead of 1d12 represents one die "split" by splitting 1d12 into 2d6.
op_1_desc: Each additional time a die is split, ie 3d4 instead of 1d12 is 2 splits instead of 1, this part increases by one.

name: Additional Damage
description: Add 1d4 damage to the technique.
op_1_desc: Add an additional 1d2 damage to this technique.

name: Add Weapon Attack
description: Add a weapon attack to this technique.
op_1_desc: 0.25 EN for each 1 TP of the weapons proficiency cost.

name: Reckless
description: When you are the target of an attack you choose to let the attack hit you. If this is the only part you may use it as a reaction.

name: Pass Through
description: Roll to hit once, attacking all creatures on a path you moved toward the target of your melee attack, you must move to use this part.

name: Spin
description: Roll to hit once, attacking all creatures within the reach of your melee attack.

name: Stun
description: Affected target gains stunned 1 for 2 rounds.
op_1_desc: Increase level of Stun by 1.
op_2_desc: Increase duration of stun by 1 round.

name: Wind Up
description: Spend 2 spaces of movement instead of moving to add +1 to your damage roll upon hit. Every 2 spaces spent adds 1 damage.
op_1_desc: Make this +1 per 1 space of movement instead.

name: Knockback
description: Upon hit, target rolls Might or Reflexes against your Style Potency and on a failure is knocked back 1 space.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN per space you knock the target back (away from your character) to a maximum of 6 spaces.
op_2_desc: 1 TP to raise maximum knockback by 2 (e.g., up to 8, 10, and so on).

name: Slow
description: Target hit rolls Fortitude against your Style Potency, on a failure gaining slow 1.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each increased level of the slowed condition.

name: Daze
description: Target hit rolls Fortitude against your Style Potency; on a failure, becomes dazed for one round.
op_1_desc: 2 EN for each additional round dazed.

name: Wide Swing
description: Roll to hit three connected spaces in your melee range.

name: Enemy Strength Reduction
description: Target hit rolls Might against your Style Potency; on a failure, their Strength decreases by 1.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN for each additional 1 Strength reduced.

name: Reach
description: This attack has 'reach,' allowing you to target one space beyond your Melee Range with melee attacks.

name: Expose
description: Target hit rolls Reflex against your Style Potency; upon failure, the creature becomes Exposed 2.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN to cause the exposed condition to last for the next two attacks.
op_2_desc: 1.5 EN for each additional +1 to the exposed condition.

name: Enemy Attack Reduction
description: Target hit rolls their choice of Might or Fortitude against your Style Potency; upon failure, target has -1 to attack for a round.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each additional -1.

name: Bleed
description: Target hit gains the bleeding 1 condition.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN for each +1 to the bleeding condition.

name: Situational Exploit
description: -25% EN: Technique can only be used when a target misses you with an attack roll. Adding this part makes this Technique usable as a basic reaction.

name: Upward Thrust
description: Target hit rolls Agility or Might against your Style Potency, adding +2 to the roll for every 200 kg they weigh; upon failure, it is thrust 1 space into the air above its current space.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each additional space upward to a maximum of 5.

name: Strength Knock Prone
description: Target hit rolls Might against your Style Potency, falling prone on a failure.

name: Pin
description: Attack target’s Might, +1 to your attack for every 200 kg you weigh. Target hit is immobile and may roll Might against your Style Potency to escape. Rolling to escape has a penalty equal to -1 for every 200 kg you weigh.

name: Grapple (Technique)
description: You take the grapple action as part of this Technique. If this is the only part, this can be done as a quick action.

name: Crush
description: Roll a Strength Attack against target creature grappled by you; upon success, the target takes damage equal to your Strength attack bonus multiplied by 2. (Strength + Martial Bonus)*2. Targets Fortitude
op_1_desc: 2 EN to double this damage, +2 EN more to triple it, and so on.

name: Body Block
description: Make a Strength Attack roll against target creature grappled by you; on success creature becomes the target of an attack made against you. If the attack would cause the grappled creature to go into negative Health, you take all damage after 0 instead. If the grappled creature is already dead or dying, it instead reduces the damage by its Fortitude bonus. If this is the only part, this can be done as a Basic Reaction. Targets Might

name: Restrain
description: Make a Strength Attack roll against target creature grappled by you; on success it gains the Restrained condition while grappled. They may roll Might against your Style Potency to break free of restraint, but still remain grappled if it is broken. Targets Might

name: Takedown
description: Make a Strength Attack roll against target creature grappled by you; on success it becomes prone. As long as they remain grappled by you, they cannot stand from prone. Targets Might

name: Throw Creature
description: Make a Strength Attack roll against target creature grappled by you; on success throw target grappled creature as if they were a thrown weapon with a range of 3 spaces. 1d8 damage is split between the thrown creature and object or creature hit +1 damage for each 100 kg the creature weighs. Creature must weigh under 1/2 of your carrying capacity. Targets Might
op_1_desc: 3 EN for each +3 to the thrown range
op_2_desc: 1 EN for each +1d2 to the thrown damage

name: Throw Weapon
description: Throw any weapon even if it doesn't have the 'Thrown' property, treating it as a thrown weapon with 3 spaces of range, rolling a Strength attack roll with proficiency against a target, and dealing damage equal to the weapon’s damage as normal.
op_1_desc: 3 EN for each +3 to the thrown range

name: Leap
description: Jump without taking a movement action. If this is the only part, this can be done as a free action.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN to double your jumping distance. +1.5 EN more to triple your jumping distance.

name: Reduce Multiple Action Penalty
description: Reduce the multiple action penalty this turn by 1. If this is the only part, this can be done as a free action.
op_1_desc: 1 EN for each additional 1 decrease.

name: Demolition
description: Damage dealt by Technique deals double damage to objects, walls, ceilings, etc.
op_1_desc: 2 EN and +1 TP to triple damage dealt to objects, walls, ceilings, instead.

name: Slam
description: Target hit rolls Fortitude against your Style Potency (which has +1 for every 200 kg you weigh). Upon failure, target takes damage equal to your Vitality + your Martial Bonus.
op_1_desc: 4 EN to double this damage. +4 EN more to triple, and so on.

name: Head Butt
description: Roll Fortitude against target’s Fortitude; upon a success, target takes damage equal to your Vitality + your Martial Bonus; on a failure, you take damage equal to target’s Fortitude.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN to double this damage. +1.5 EN more to triple, and so on.

name: Weaken (Technique)
description: Target hit gains the weakened 1 condition.
op_1_desc: 3 EN for each level of weakened.

name: Make Vulnerable
description: Target hit gains the Vulnerable 1 condition.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN for each level of Vulnerable.

name: Brace
description: Take the Brace action as part of this Technique. If this is the only part, this can be done as a free action.
op_1_desc: 2 EN to double the brace reduction, +2 EN more to triple it, and so on.

name: Parry
description: Roll a melee attack against a target’s melee attack roll against you. Upon meeting or exceeding their attack roll, you cause their attack to miss. If this is the only part added, it can be done as a Reaction.

name: Unarmed Hit(s)
description: Add a single unarmed prowess hit to your attack in addition to any attack made as part of the Technique.
op_1_desc: 4 EN add a second unarmed prowess hit.
op_2_desc: 6 EN add a third unarmed prowess hit.

name: Agile Knock Prone
description: Target hit rolls Reflex against your Style Potency, falling prone on a failure.

name: Charge
description: Add +1 to damage for every 2 spaces moved in the direction of target.
op_1_desc: 3 EN to add +1 for every 1 space you move in the direction of the target. +3 EN more to make this +2 for every 1 space, and so on.

name: Quick Strike/Shot
description: Use Agility instead of another ability on a roll to hit.
op_1_desc: 5 EN to instead to add 1/2 Agility to your attack roll. +3 EN to add your full Agility to your attack roll.

name: Disarm
description: Target hit rolls Might or Reflex against your Style Potency, +3 to target’s roll if the item you’re disarming is two-handed. Upon failure, target drops target item.

name: Break Sight
description: Move from one location to another within a target’s Melee Range and roll Stealth or Hide against their Perceive Score; upon a success, you have the hidden condition to that target.

name: Disengage
description: Move one space away from a target after it attacks you. If this is the only part of the Technique, it can be used as a Quick Reaction.

name: Catch Ranged Attack
description: Roll Reflex against a physical ranged attack that passes through or targets a creature within one space. Upon meeting or beating the attack roll, catch the projectile and reduce the damage to 0. If this is the only part this can be done as a reaction.
op_1_desc: 2 EN, caught projectiles can be rebounded as part of the same action in which they were caught by making a thrown improvised weapon attack.

name: Catch Melee Attack
description: Roll Reflex against a physical melee attack that passes through or targets a creature within one space. Upon meeting or beating the attack roll, catch the attack. During the same action in which the attack was caught, you have advantage on all physical d20 rolls against the target caught creature. This includes attack rolls. If this is the only part this can be done as a reaction.

name: Hide
description: You gain the hidden condition from all creatures to which you are at least moderately obscured from without rolling to Stealth or Hide. Alternatively, you may choose to roll to Stealth or Hide. If this is the only Technique part, this can be done as a quick action.

name: Evade
description: You take the evade action as part of the Technique without spending action points.
op_1_desc: 2 EN for each equivalent of 1 action point spent on the Evade action.

name: Maneuver
description: You take the movement action as part of the Technique without spending action points but only moving half of your movement speed.
op_1_desc: 2 EN to allow you to move your full movement speed.

name: Side-Step
description: When attacked, add +1 to your Evasion and you may move one space adjacent to your current space that is still within the attack’s range. If this is the only part, this can be done as a reaction. This can cause the attack to miss, but doesn't guarantee it.
op_1_desc: 2 EN for each +1 to your Evasion.

name: Switch
description: Switch places with a willing creature within your melee range or an unwilling creature that you either hit with this attack or who fails a Might or Reflex roll against your Style Potency. This doesn’t trigger any effects based on moving in or out of melee range for you or the enemy.

name: Focus Hit
description: Gain a +1 bonus to your attack roll for every 2 spaces of movement you spend. Spent movement includes any speed gained from your movement action or other feats used this turn. This movement is forfeited and cannot be used to move.
op_1_desc: 3 EN to add +1 for every 1 space you spend. +3 EN more to make this +2 for every 1 space, and so on.

name: Rush
description: Add +1 to attack roll for every 2 spaces moved in the direction of target.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN to add +1 for every 1 space you move in the direction of the target. +2.5 EN more to make this +2 for every 1 space, and so on.

name: Vital Point
description: Add 1/2 Acuity to your melee attack roll.
op_1_desc: 3 EN to add your full Acuity to your melee attack roll.

name: Feint
description: Roll Act or Deceive against an enemy’s Insight score, gaining +1 to hit for each success.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for every +1 to hit up to a maximum of +3.

name: Goad
description: Make a Taunt Roll against a target’s Resolve; upon success, the target becomes set on eliminating you specifically, gaining -5 to attack all creatures other than you for a round.
op_1_desc: 2 EN to target all creatures within 3 spaces that you can see, +2 EN for each additional 3 spaces of range.

name: Menace
description: Intimidate a target against their Resolve. If you succeed, you frighten the target. Target may roll Resolve against your Intimidate Score to end the condition, otherwise it ends in one minute.

name: Rally
description: Roll Perform or Charm against a target you can see. The score to overcome is equal to 10 - Target’s Resolve bonus. Upon success, the creature gains resilient 1.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN for each level of resilient. Each success increases resilient by +1. +2.5 EN for each additional target rallied.

name: Defend
description: Take the defend action as part of this Technique; if this is the only part added, this may be done as a free reaction.

name: Resilience
description: Gain the Resilient 1 condition.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN for each level of Resilient.

name: Clash
description: When you are targeted by a physical attack and with a melee weapon you are wielding you may reduce the attack’s damage by your attack’s damage. If this is the only part of this Technique, it may be done as a quick reaction.

name: Infiltrate
description: This attack ignores one damage resistance of your choice. Choose the type before attacking. (This ignores the effects of resistance but not damage reduction the target has.)

name: Hidden Attack
description: Using an interaction plus ability action, hide this weapon with Sleight of Hand against target(s) Vigilance; if hidden from an enemy when you attack, get +2 on the roll to hit.

name: Penetration
description: This Technique ignores up to 3 points of damage reduction from armor.
op_1_desc: 1 EN For each additional 3 points of damage reduction from armor ignored.

name: Pinning Weapon
description: Target hit with a melee or thrown piercing weapon attack rolls might against your style potency becoming immobile on a failure.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN to allow this attack to be ranged piercing weapons/projectiles.

name: Command
description: Give any number of your remaining action points to a chosen willing target; they must use these action points to take actions as close to your explained desires as possible unless you choose not to give specific commands.

name: Buck Shot
description: Add additional projectile(s) to a physical ranged attack. (3 EN, +1 TP per each additional projectile, up to 4 total if shot, 4 per hand if thrown) Roll to hit only once, only hit one target. Must pay for added effects for each projectile.

name: Spread Shot
description: Add additional projectile(s) to a physical ranged attack. Each hits an individual target of your choice. Roll to hit for each target. Must pay EN cost for added effects for each projectile, excluding Training Point cost for additional effects on each projectile after the first.
op_1_desc: 4, +1 TP EN for every additional projectile. Up to 3 total if shot, 4 per hand if thrown

name: Long Shot
description: Increase the range of this Technique by 2 spaces. Must be used in conjunction with a weapon with the “Range” or “Thrown” part.
op_1_desc: 0.75 EN for every 2 additional spaces.

name: Volley
description: Send a volley of projectiles that can reach over cover as high as half the range of your attack. A 2-space radius circle centered in a location you can see or at a distance you can describe if you can't see is hit by this attack. This attack targets the Reflexes of all creatures in the attack’s area of effect.
op_1_desc: 5 EN to increase the ring’s radius by 1 to a maximum radius of 12 spaces.

name: Piercing
description: Each target on a path to the target is a target of this attack. This attack can pass through targets on its path to a target.

name: Curved Shot
description: This attack ignores the penalties of attacking an obscured target unless that target is fully obscured on all sides except the side facing away from you (the target does not need to be fully obscured from behind).

name: First Blood
description: Make a basic attack before combat starts (when initiative has already been rolled but before any creature takes their first turn). If this is the only part this may be done as a free reaction.

name: Splitting Shot
description: When your ranged projectile hits or misses a target, all creatures within one space of that target (including the target) must roll Reflex and be affected by the attack on a failure.

name: Attack / Potency Increase
description: 25% Increase the attack roll or potency of this Power by +1.
op_1_desc: +25% EN for each additional +1, up to a maximum increase of +5.

name: Personal Power Linger
description: 50% EN: Cause an offensive based Power to become an option for you to use each round using the same action which you spent to use it. Each round you may make another attack with this Power without spending the energy. You have this option for as long as the Power lingers.
op_1_desc: +50% EN for each additional round of lingering (up to 10 rounds).
op_2_desc: -50% EN from the total cost of personal Power linger if the Power has focus, and/or does not directly harm a target or involve any adaptation parts. -50% EN from the total cost of personal Power linger to make the Power's effect activate only once more than the initial time during the lingering duration, after which it ends.
op_3_desc: 50% To make using this Power on future turns take one less action point than the original action cost. (Basic action to quick action.)

name: Power Long Action
description: -12.5% EN: This Power uses a 3 Action Point Long Action.
op_1_desc: -25% EN: This Power uses a 4 Action Point Long Action.

name: Power Reaction
description: 25% EN: This Power uses a Basic (or other) reaction instead of action.

name: Power Quick or Free Action
description: 25% EN: This Power uses a quick action to activate instead of a basic action.
op_1_desc: 50% EN: This Power uses a free action to activate instead of a basic action

name: Rite
description: You may use a Power for free if you spend 10 minutes casting it and it meets these criteria: The total EN cost is no more than ¼ of your maximum EN. It causes no damage or healing. Its function is to locate, identify, summon, or traverse something, communicate, or seek/obtain information. If summoning, the creature summoned is at most 12.5% of your level. You can only have one summon this way.
op_1_desc: -1 EN Use this to reduce cost.

name: Long Rite
description: -50% EN: You spend 1 hour to use this Power. The total EN cost must be no more than ¼ of your maximum EN. It may cause no damage or healing. Its function must be to locate, identify, summon, or traverse something, communicate, or seek/obtain information. If summoning, the creature summoned can be at most 1/4 of your level.

name: Trigger on Condition
description: 25% EN: Make the Power activate upon certain conditions (e.g., hitting with an attack, taking damage, falling below 0 Health). Upon activation, it casts as if you were casting it normally. This does not count as a reaction. Triggered Powers cannot have the 'long cast' part. A creature can only have 1 trigger Power affecting them at a time. This trigger has a duration of 1 hour ending after this time or when it is used.
op_1_desc: 50% EN instead to make it 1 day.
op_2_desc: Double EN Instead to make it 10 days.

name: Delayed Effect
description: 25% EN: When you use this Power its effect doesn't immediately go off and it doesn't require you to overcome any defenses. You may use a free reaction at any time to cause the Power to activate. For each round the Power doesn't activate you may add an additional effect to the Power, or increase an existing effect on the Power, equal to 1/8 of this Power's energy. This Power and its effects cannot have a duration longer than 1 minute. When the Power ends if it has not been activated it automatically activates then ends.

name: Line of Effect
description: 25% EN: Each creature occupying a space directly between you and the power's target is affected by this power. Roll attack and damage once and apply it to all creatures affected.

name: Cone of Effect
description: 12.5% EN: Create a 45-degree angle cone that goes directly out from yourself for 2 spaces. Roll one attack against all targets' relevant defense.
op_1_desc: 12.5% EN: Increase this effect by +1 space.

name: Detect Creature Type
description: Detect the presence of a certain creature type within the range of this Power.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional creature type.

name: Detect Power
description: Target becomes aware if there is any Power, magic, or supernatural effects active within a distance from the range of the Power.
op_1_desc: 2.5 EN Target also learns what types of Power parts are involved (such as creation, adaptation, and so on).

name: Detect Damage
description: Detect a certain damage type within the range of this Power, each creature or object capable of dealing that damage type becomes known to the target including the direction or an outline shown to the target of that thing when viewing it.

name: Identify
description: Target gains awareness of a target object in range's properties and magical or supernatural properties if any. Some properties may remain hidden until the object is used as intended, but most properties will be available (if not all) at the RM's discretion.

name: Omen
description: Gain awareness of future events that are likely to occur in the next 30 minutes based on yours and others planned courses of action. You know whether the coming events in this time are good, bad, good and bad, or neutral. Each time after the first you use this Power in 24 hours you have a 50% chance of it not working despite spending energy.

name: Detect Traps
description: Detect traps within the range of the spell. You see a faint outline or aura around any traps within the range. Traps are defined as mechanisms, Powers, or objects intended to be unknowingly triggered to harm or capture creatures.

name: Locate Animals
description: You learn the direction, path, and location of the closest of a specific animal or beast type of your choice when you use this Power provided it is within 2 kilometers.
op_1_desc: +0.75 EN for each additional 2 kilometers.

name: Locate Plants
description: You learn the direction, path, and location of the closest of a specific plant or herb type of your choice when you use this Power provided it is within 2 kilometers.
op_1_desc: +0.75 EN for each additional 2 kilometers.

name: Locate Object
description: You learn the direction, path, and location of the closest of a specific object of your choice that is familiar to you when you use this Power provided it is within 300 meters.
op_1_desc: +0.75 EN for each additional 300 meters.

name: Locate Creature
description: You learn the direction, path, and location of the closest of a specific creature of your choice that is familiar to you when you use this Power provided it is within 300 meters. If the creature is not in its normal form then this Power fails to locate it.
op_1_desc: +0.75 EN for each additional 300 meters.

name: Locate Creature on Overcome
description: If you overcome a creature's defense with any part of this Power you also learn its exact location for the next round including how far it is from you and in what direction. While detected this way it cannot be hidden from you. If this Power doesn't have an attack roll you may target Mental Fortitude instead.

name: Detect Invisibility
description: You can see invisible things and creatures as if they were not invisible. You ignore the effects of the invisible condition for these creatures and objects. If this is an area of effect you may choose to cause each creature affected to gain this effect, or instead cause the area to reveal all invisible things instead. If you target a creature to end or remove its ability to be invisible this target's evasion.

name: See Through Illusion
description: Visual illusions are invisible to you, and you automatically overcome anything targeting discernment related to this type of illusion.

name: Sensor
description: Create a tiny invisible and silent sensor that you can move up to the range of this Power as a quick action. You can choose to hear, see, taste, or feel through this sensor as if it was an extension of your senses.

name: Scry
description: A silent invisible sensor appears within 2 spaces of target creature or location that remains within the location or 2 spaces of range as the creature moves. You can sense through it as if it's an extension of your vision and hearing. Target's Mental Fortitude or Resolve. You gain +5 to overcome if you know the target well or -5 if you've only heard of the target. In addition, you gain +2 to overcome if you have the target's picture or likeness, +4 if you have a possession of the target's, and +10 if you have part of its body (including hair or part of a nail). These bonuses and penalties all apply together, but each can only apply once.

name: Find Path
description: Name a specific location you are familiar with. You gain an awareness of the most direct physical route to reach it. For the duration, while you remain in the same realm as the location, you intuitively sense its distance and direction. When presented with multiple paths, you know which one is the most direct route toward your destination. This Power fails if the destination is in a different realm, is mobile (such as a floating fortress), or is too vague (like 'a dragon's lair').

name: Enrich Plantlife
description: Enrich all plant life within the range of this Power from you. The crops recover from any temporary ailment or illness, edible harvest from these crops if any is doubled for the next 30 days, although the currency value remains that of a normal harvest.
op_1_desc: +4 EN to make this 200 meters instead.
op_2_desc: +8 EN to make this 1 kilometer instead.

name: Liquid Walk
description: Target gains the ability to walk across any liquid as if it was a solid surface. Target may spend a quick action to sink into the liquid like normal, but cannot walk on the surface again until it would be able to get above the liquid.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN to allow you to walk on harmful surfaces without being affected.

name: Create
description: You transform raw materials into finished products of the same material. For instance, you might craft a wooden bridge from a stand of trees, a rope from a patch of hemp, or clothing from flax or wool. Select raw materials within view and range. With a sufficient quantity, you can fabricate a Large or smaller object, fitting within a 1 space cube or up to four connected 1 space cubes. If using metal, stone, or another mineral substance, however, the finished object can be no larger than Medium, fitting within a 1 space cube. The quality of any created objects depends on the quality of the raw materials. This effect cannot create creatures or magic items, nor can it produce items that require a high degree of craftsmanship—such as weapons or armor—unless you are proficient with the appropriate skill(s) required for their crafting.
op_1_desc: +7 EN to double the amounts of a 1 space cube or up to four connected 1 space cubes to a 2 space cube or eight connected 1 space cubes.

name: Speak with the Dead
description: Cause a corpse to answer one question it might have answered in life, with no obligation to speak honestly. The answers may be cryptic or repetitive. Once five questions have been asked, or after 10 minutes, the corpse returns to its inanimate state.
op_1_desc: +2 EN per additional question.

name: Health Summon
description: Summon a Creature from Another Location or Realm: You may summon a creature by paying Health or EN. The summon stays until killed. The cost is +6 Health and/or EN total for each 1/4th level of the summon. Your maximum Health and/or EN is permanently lowered by the amount spent. These maximums revert to normal when the summon dies or is dismissed (a free action), but you do not regain the lost points immediately, only your maximum returns. For determining energy costs, this Power part costs the total amount of Health and EN spent. You must decide the level and creature you summon when creating this Power. (See Summoning and Summon Creation Rules in the Core Rulebook).
op_1_desc: The cost is +6 Health and/or EN total for each 1/4th level of the summon.

name: Power Summon
description: Create or Summon a Temporary Creature: You summon a creature that lasts for 5 minutes at a base cost of 6 EN + 1 TP per 1/4th level of the summon. You must decide the level and creature summoned when creating this Power.
op_1_desc: 1 TP, 6 EN per 1/4th level of the summon
op_2_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional 5 minutes.

name: Neutral Summon
description: Summon an Unaligned Creature: You summon a creature with no dedicated agenda or alliance. The creature is controlled by the Realms Master and behaves according to the situation. The summon lasts until a full recovery or until killed.
op_1_desc: 1 TP, per 1/4th level of the summon.

name: Raise Undead
description: Raise an Undead Servant: While in range of a mostly intact corpse, you can raise an undead creature. The creature becomes a mindless summon under your control, with no memory or personality from its past life. It lasts until a full recovery or until killed. Use the same stat block as the creature had in life but replace its intelligence with -2. It gains resistance to necrotic damage and a weakness to spiritual damage. (See Summoning Rules in the Core Rulebook). You can decide the level of the creature raised when using this Power, paying the corresponding energy cost.
op_1_desc: 1 TP, per level of the creature.

name: Weapon Summon
description: Summon a Weapon to Hand: You summon a weapon directly to your hand. You are considered proficient with this weapon for the duration. If the weapon requires ammunition, you have access to it for the duration. The weapon lasts for 1 minute. You may decide which weapon to summon when using this Power, provided its TP cost is within the limit of what the Power allows.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each 1 TP of the weapon's proficiency cost

name: Summon or Beast Senses
description: Merge your perception and senses with that of a willing target creature that is a summon, familiar, or beast. You temporarily replace your Acuity with the target's and can perceive through its senses including special senses. Target's mental fortitude or resolve if the target is unwilling.

name: Resurrection
description: While in range of part of a dead target and return it to life with maximum Health and any missing body parts restored, as long as the target died within the last ten years. This Power part takes 1 hour to use.
op_1_desc: +15 EN for each additional 10 years the target has been dead.

name: True Resurrection
description: Speak the name of a dead target and return it to life with maximum Health and any missing body parts restored within the range of this Power, as long as the target died within the last one-hundred years. This Power part takes 1 hour to use.
op_1_desc: +40 EN for each additional 100 years the target has been dead.

name: Ward from Death
description: When target would enter the dying condition, they instead drop to 1 Health. This effect lasts for 8 hours but ends when used.

name: Irreducible Max Health
description: Target cannot have its health reduced below its maximum Health.

name: Stasis
description: Target dead creature stops decaying completely and cannot rot any further. Any Power or feat that requires a target has been dead less than a certain amount of time can affect this creature as if it had only been dead for as long as it had when this Power was used. Target's affected this way cannot be raised as undead creatures.

name: Feign Death
description: Target creature enters a death-like state that is only perceivable as death unless perceived with Powers and feats that reveal the creature is alive. The target must be willing, and gains the blinded condition for the duration. Target has resistance to all damage other than psychic for the Power's duration and cannot gain the weakened condition. Persists for 1 hour.

name: Suppress Healing
description: Target is unable to regain health for the duration of the Power.

name: Permanent Damage
description: 75% EN: Target's maximum health is reduced by an amount equal to the damage dealt by this Power when initially used, to a minimum of 1.

name: Speed Increase
description: Increase target's Speed by 1.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN per each additional +1, to a maximum of +10 from this part.

name: Adapting
description: Target creature gains a feat for the duration.
op_1_desc: +1 TP, +6 EN for each additional feat, up to a maximum of 3 feats gained from this part.

name: Ability Increase
description: Increase the target's Ability by +1 for the duration. No ability can be increased above 10 using this part.
op_1_desc: +7 EN for each additional +1 to the ability, to a maximum of +8.
op_2_desc: +3 EN to increase the maximum increase cap by +1.

name: Jump
description: Double target's jump distance. +2.5 EN To triple it instead.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN To triple it instead.

name: Skill Sharpen
description: Increase target's Skill by +1 for the duration. No skill can be increased above 10 using this part.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional +1 to a Skill, to a maximum of +8 from this part.
op_2_desc: +1 EN for each +1 increase to the skill increase maximum.

name: Debuffing
description: Decrease target's Ability by -1 for the duration. No ability can be decreased below -5 using this part.
op_1_desc: +4 EN for each additional -1 decrease to an Ability.
op_2_desc: +6 EN for each -1 increase to this maximum.

name: Leave No Tracks
description: Target leaves no tracks or noticable signs of presence to be tracked by natural means.

name: Restore
description: End or decrease by 1 a chosen condition on the target. This condition must be chosen when you create this Power.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional level of a condition you decrease.

name: Greater Restore
description: End or decrease by 1 a condition of your choice on the target.
op_1_desc: +5 EN for each additional condition or level of condition.

name: Ability Restore
description: Target may restore any number of their values (maximum health, energy, abilities, and so on) to their normal value.

name: Enhancement
description: Add +1d2 to each Ability or Skill Roll or Score of the target's choice used during the Power's duration.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional +1d2.

name: Deafen
description: Target becomes deafened. Target's Fortitude.

name: Bane
description: Apply -1d2 to a Defense, Attack type (e.g., Strength or Agility attack), Potency, or Skill of your choice used during the Power's duration. You may choose to have this affect all defenses but end the first time it is used to lower a defense.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional -1d2 decrease.

name: Weakened Strikes
description: Decrease target's damage by 1d2.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional 1d2 damage reduction.

name: Battle Disable
description: Decrease the target's attacks by 1. Targets your choice of Fortitude, Resolve, or Mental Fortitude which you choose upon making this Power.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional decrease of 1.

name: Shield
description: Create a shield localized to a target which takes damage before they would at the cost of its Health. Target applies all damage to the shield before accounting for their resistances, vulnerabilities, and reductions.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN For every 2 Health of shield created.
op_2_desc: +1EN to add an element (Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison) to the shield giving the shield resistance to that element, and vulnerability to the opposite element.

name: Weaken
description: Target gains the weakened 1 condition.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional level of weakened condition applied.

name: Expose Vitals
description: Decrease target's critical range by 1 to a maximum of -10 from this part. Target's evasion.
op_1_desc: +6 EN for each additional -1 to critical range.

name: Weapon Damage Boost
description: Increase weapon damage dealt by target by 1d2 equal to the damage type of your choice, or the damage type they deal normally.
op_1_desc: +2.5 for each additional 1d2.

name: Purify
description: Remove a potion effect from an area, or object. You may choose to specify to remove any or a random effect if you are unaware if there is one (i.e., purifying food from a poison, even if you're unsure there is any.)

name: Darkvision
description: Target gains darkvision out to 6 spaces.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional 6 spaces of darkvision.

name: Enlarge
description: Increase willing target's size by one level. Target's evasion if unwilling.

name: Shrink
description: Decrease willing target's size by one level. Target's evasion if unwilling.

name: Gas Form
description: Target willing creature transforms, along with anything they are wearing or holding, into a cloud of mist for a set duration. This Power ends early if the target's Health reaches 0 or if they use a basic action to end the transformation themselves. While in this mist form, the creature's only movement is flying with a speed of 2 spaces. They can move through other creatures' spaces, resist Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (but are still susceptible to damage from force or area effects). Target can only pass through spaces if those are not sealed off, but even they may pass through air-tight doors or gaps where they can fit. Other creatures cannot follow the target, except if they have certain abilities or specialized Powers.

name: Guided
description: Ignore the effect s of one level obscurity when targeting a creature with this Power.
op_1_desc: =+1.5 EN for each additional level of obscurity ignored.

name: Invisible Power
description: Power is invisible, the location of its effect cannot be seen, nor can its path of travel and so on.

name: Subtle Power Use
description: You use the Power undetected. Creatures cannot perceive you are using a Power or are the one who used it. Creatures can roll discernment against your potency to attempt to perceive you as the Power user.

name: Cause to Lose Focus
description: Target loses focus. Targets any defense of your choice other than evasion that's already a part of the Power, otherwise this targets mental fortitude or resolve.

name: Dousing
description: Power douses exposed flame in the area that aren't an active Power. This can still be used to counter active fire Powers.

name: Flammable
description: The area or creatures your Power affects are flammable while the Power affects them. If touched by fire, the area or creature ignites, taking 1d4 fire damage each turn until an interaction is taken to put the fire out.

name: Relocate Power
description: As a basic action, you may move this Power to a new location within half its range, without affecting any creatures or objects along the path.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN to use a quick action instead.
op_2_desc: +3 EN to use a free action.
op_3_desc: +3 EN to affect all creatures and objects on the path to the new location.

name: Interaction
description: You take the interact action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.

name: Ability Roll
description: You take the ability roll action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.

name: Evade
description: You take the evade action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.
op_1_desc: 4 EN for each additional time you take the evade action as part of this Power up to 4 times.

name: Brace
description: You take the brace action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.
op_1_desc: 4 EN for each additional time you take the brace action as part of this Power up to 4 times.

name: Focus (Action)
description: You take the focus action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.
op_1_desc: 5 EN for each additional time you take the focus action as part of this Power up to 4 times.

name: Search/Detect (Action)
description: You take the search or detect action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action or reaction.

name: Stealth/Hide (Action)
description: You take the stealth or hide action as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free action.
op_1_desc: 7 EN to sustain this action on future turns without any action points for the duration of the Power.

name: Combination Attack
description: You take the combination attack reaction as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free reaction.

name: Help (Reaction)
description: You take the help reaction as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free reaction.

name: Defend
description: You take the defend reaction as part of this Power. If this is the only Power part that is not a general part or Power mechanic, it can be taken as a free reaction.

name: Outer Illusion
description: Outer illusions make the outside world seem different in some way (e.g., creating the appearance of a chest, person, animal, tree, etc.). An outer illusion is an inanimate illusion occupying a single target space and cannot target a creature. If a creature has reason to suspect it is an illusion, they may roll Discernment against your potency to learn it is an illusion.
op_1_desc: +1 EN & 1 TP for each additional space the illusion affects.
op_2_desc: +1 EN & 2 TP to add sound to the illusion.
op_3_desc: +2 EN & 2 TP to add both sound and animation/in-place movement.

name: Massive Outer Illusion
description: Outer illusions make the outside world seem different in some way (e.g., creating the appearance of a chest, person, animal, tree, etc.). An outer illusion is an inanimate illusion occupying a single target space and cannot target a creature. If a creature has reason to suspect it is an illusion, they may roll Discernment against your potency to learn it is an illusion. The size of this illusion is equal to the size of the Power's effect.
op_1_desc: +1 EN for each additional space the illusion affects.
op_2_desc: +1 EN & 1 TP to add sound to the illusion.
op_3_desc: +2 EN & 1 TP to add both sound and animation/in-place movement.

name: Inner Illusion
description: Inner illusions make part of the world seem different in some way (e.g., creating the appearance of a chest, person, animal, tree, etc.) to a targeted individual. You may add other Power parts to this Power at 50% their energy cost to be part of the illusion, targeting mental fortitude instead of the normal defense. Any damage added is applied as psychic after applying resistances, vulnerabilities, and reductions. If a creature has reason to suspect it is an illusion, they may roll Discernment against your potency to learn it is an illusion.
op_1_desc: +1 EN for each additional space the illusion affects.
op_2_desc: +1 EN & 1 TP to add sound to the illusion.
op_3_desc: +2 EN & 1 TP to add both sound and animation/in-place movement.

name: Invisibility
description: Make a willing target invisible for 1 hour. Targets evasion if the target is unwilling. Invisibility ends if the target uses a Power, Technique, or attack.

name: Combat Invisibility
description: Willing target becomes invisible. Targets evasion if unwilling.

name: Disguise
description: Change how you look and what you appear to be wearing to others for 10 minutes. This change cannot make you appear a size larger or smaller than your actual size. If a creature suspects you're disguised, they may roll Discernment against your potency to learn you are disguised.
op_1_desc: +3 EN for every additional 5 minutes.

name: Blind
description: Target creature becomes blinded. Target's Fortitude.

name: Silence
description: The space or target creature hit becomes completely silent. While affected, they gain the deafened condition and cannot use Powers that require the Charisma Power ability.

name: Scry Time
description: Look 6 seconds (1 round) into the future. All attack actions, potencies, and defenses gain +3 during these rounds.
op_1_desc: +9 EN for each additional turn seen in the future.

name: Read Mind
description: Read a target's immediate thoughts (what they are thinking about in that moment). You must roll a Power attack against a target's Discernment and succeed for them to not notice you are reading their mind. If you fail, they know you are attempting to read their mind and may roll Mental Fortitude against your potency, causing the Power to fail on success.
op_1_desc: +4 EN & 1 TP to know their deeper thoughts and plans.
op_2_desc: +8 EN & 2 TP instead to also know their deepest thoughts, secrets, intents, and desires.
op_3_desc: +4 EN for each level of mind read (including first) for target to be unaware of your mind reading attempts.

name: Darkness
description: Cause darkness to fill a specific area, lightly obscuring it. If cast on a light source, the light's radius decreases by 2 spaces for each level of obscurity. Light sources created by Powers instead decrease by 1 space for each level of obscurity.
op_1_desc: +2 EN for each additional level of obscurity.

name: Fog
description: Create a thick cloud in a specific area (default 1 space), causing the area to become lightly obscured.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each level of obscurity.

name: Modify Memories
description: You alter the memories of a target. If the creature is engaged in combat with you, it gains +5 to overcome this effect. The target becomes stunned 10 and is unaware of its surroundings, though it remains able to hear you. If the target suffers damage or is affected by another effect or Power, this effect ends without modifying any memories. While the target is stunned, you may reshape its memory of an event that took place within the last 24 hours, provided the event lasted no more than 10 minutes. You can permanently erase the memory, make the target recall it with perfect accuracy, alter the details of the event, or implant a memory of a different event entirely. To modify the target's memory, you must describe the changes verbally in a language it understands. The target's mind fills in any inconsistencies in your description. If the energy's effect ends before you finish altering the memories, no changes take place. If completed, the modified memories take hold as this Power ends. A modified memory may not necessarily change the creature's behavior, especially if it conflicts with the creature's personality, alignment, or beliefs. Illogical memories, like fondly recalling a swim in acid, are dismissed as dreams or misremembered events. The Realm Master may decide if a memory alteration is too unreasonable to influence the creature. Targets Resolve.

name: Illusioned Power
description: 50% EN: This Power and its effects are entirely illusionary, although they still do the same things and have the same effect on the target as if it is really happening. Any damage the target takes still applies resistances and weakness of the damage type, but the actual damage that is applied is psychic. This means if you add fire damage to this Power and deal 5 fire damage to a creature weak to fire, it would take 10 fire damage instead, but if it was also resistant to psychic, it would reduce that 10 to 5. The entire Power and it's effect's target resolve instead of any other targeted defenses. The target cannot attempt to overcome this Power after being effected until it suspects that it may be an illusion.

name: Programmed Illusion
description: Your illusion Power is programed to move, sound, and appear in a certain way for up to 5 minutes when used.

name: Dream
description: You choose a creature you are familiar with in the same realm. You or a willing creature enters a trance state to serve as a dream messenger. While in this trance, the messenger becomes unconscious and its movement speed becomes 0. If the target is asleep, the messenger manifests in the target's dreams, allowing for conversation for the duration of the Power as long as the target remains asleep. The messenger can also shape the dream environment, creating landscapes, objects, and various images. The messenger can exit the trance at any moment, which ends the Power. The target will recall the dream in detail upon waking. If the target is awake when the Power is used, the messenger becomes aware of this and can either terminate the trance (and thus the Power) or wait for the target to fall asleep, at which point the messenger enters the target's dreams. You can choose to make the messenger appear terrifying to the target. If you do, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words targeting resolve using your Power bonus. On a failed save, the target suffers no restorative benefits from its recovery and takes 1d6 psychic damage upon waking.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional 1d6 psychic damage.

name: Enthrall
description: Target gets -1 to Discernment and Acuity skills when trying to perceive anything or anyone other than you, or a willing creature within range. Targets Resolve.
op_1_desc: +0.75 EN for each additional -1 to a maximum of -15.

name: Compelled Duel
description: Target must overcome your potency with resolve each time it tries to attack a target other than you. If it fails, it may choose to use that action later in the turn to attack you instead, or it loses the action.

name: Disagreeable
description: Target feels that every piece of information they encounter is wrong and they disagree with this information. This can be an opinion, idea, fact, with any method of delivery; written spoken or telepathically delivered and so on. If more than one creature interacts with another who has this affect, they continually argue for the duration of the Power or until something causes them to stop interacting in this way. Target's Resolve.

name: Disorient
description: Target believe's the direction it's going is either the correct direction for their desired goal, or the opposite direction of their desired goal. If the creature can see the place they are desiring to go they gain +10 on the defense to overcome this affect. Targets Discernment or Resolve.

name: Nondetection
description: Target cannot be the target of any Power that would attempt to locate, or remotely see or perceive the target in any way.

name: Body Swap
description: You become the target creature and target creature becomes you, each taking the physical body and location of the other. You retain all mental abilities, but temporarily replace your physical abilities, defenses, movement speed, evasion, physically related racial traits and current/maximum health with the target's. You do not gain any of the target's proficiencies and each of your item's worn and carried remain on your body and do not travel with you to your new form. The same conditions apply to the creature in your form. You may still use Power's and Techniques known to you provided your new form allows it. You may choose to return to your form as a free action. Target's your choice of mental fortitude or resolve.

name: Take-Over
description: You gain control over 1 of the target creature's action points (AP) and may, as a reaction at the start of that creature's turn, spend an equal amount of your own action points to force the creature to take a specific action. When you first affect the creature, you immediately gain knowledge of all possible actions they can take. The action you cause them to take can be any that the creature is capable of performing. The affected creature can use it's remaining action points first, before you use the taken action points to perform actions. Targets Resolve.
op_1_desc: +11 EN & +1 TP for each extra AP, up to a maximum of 3 AP in total.

name: Compelling Sight
description: 50% EN: After the initial use of the Power causes a target to be effected, that target cannot attempt to overcome this Power's effect while they remain within the range of this Power and in line of sight of you or a creature you chose within range. This has no effect on a creature that does not have sight.

name: Suggest
description: You propose a course of action—explained in no more than 25 words—to a creature within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must seem reasonable and cannot involve actions that would obviously harm the target or its allies. For example, you might say, "Retrieve the book about the evil-doers activities vault and hand it to me," or "Cease fighting, leave this town peacefully, and do not come back." This course of action is taken for the duration of this Power or until you or your allies cause the target harm. The target follows the suggestion to the best of its ability. If the suggested action can be completed before the Power's duration ends, the Power ends early. If the target is charmed by you they spend one additional action point on this movement until they are within 1 space of you. If the target is frightened of you they spend an additional action point moving away until they're in a location where they cannot move further. Target's Resolve.

name: Compelled Movement
description: Target must spend 1 action point on it's turn to move away from or towards you in the quickest and safest route possible. Target's Resolve
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN to increase this to 2 action points spent on movement instead.
op_2_desc: =+2.5 to force the creature to spend these action point(s) (if any) as a reaction, moving immediately instead. If the creature doesn't have action points to spend on reactionary movement, they must spend as many as they can now, then spend the rest as a reaction when they regain action points.

name: Mind Break
description: At the start of the target's turn they must roll Resolve against your potency (this does not count as their ability roll action). Every 5 under the potency results in that creature losing an action point. If they lose more action points than they have, then begin decreasing the amount of action points they regain at the end of their turn. Targets Resolve.

name: Shift Focus
description: Target has a -1 on all attacks made against you for the duration.
op_1_desc: +3 EN for each additional -1.

name: Curse
description: Target has -2 to the Defense and Skill rolls of one ability of your choice when you use this Power. Targets Mental Fortitude, Resolve, or Fortitude. Power's can have multiple of this part if each targets a different Ability.
op_1_desc: +3 EN for each additional -1.
op_2_desc: +4 EN to also reduce Defense and Skill Scores of chosen ability.

name: Communicate
description: Gain the ability to communicate with animals, non-sentient creatures, or plants for one minute, being able to understand them, and them you.
op_1_desc: +2 EN to extend this to one hour.
op_2_desc: +6 EN to extend this to one day instead.

name: De-motivate
description: Target gains the weakened 1 condition whenever attempting to pursue the course of action they were taking when this Power was used. Targets resolve.
op_1_desc: +2 EN to increase the weakened condition by +1.

name: Escalate
description: Any emotion currently being felt by the target is heightened, targeting resolve. Example: If the target is feeling angry at someone or something, their anger is escalated to the level of the aggravate Power part. If it was a Power-induced aggravation, the Power's effect is doubled.

name: Vertigo
description: Target becomes faint. Targets resolve.

name: Aggravate
description: Target becomes aggravated or more aggravated at a target of your choice that they can see for the round. Aggravated targets want to destroy the target they are aggravated at. +3 EN To cause the target to be angered towards any nearby target indiscriminately. Targets resolve.
op_1_desc: If the target is someone whom they are allied with, they gain a +8 bonus to their resolve to overcome this effect. +1.5 EN for each decrease of this bonus by 1.
op_2_desc: +3 EN To cause the target to be angered towards any nearby target indiscriminately without granting a bonus to Resolve.

name: Friends
description: Target considers you friendly if it was indifferent or warm to you before and not hostile. If the target overcomes this Power they are aware that you used a Power to try and influence them provided their intelligence is above -4. Target's Resolve.

name: Indifference
description: Target becomes indifferent toward creatures it was hostile at previously. This indifference ends when any hostile action is taken toward the target or it's allies from said creatures or their allies, or whenever the target takes damage. When the Power ends their attitude returns to what it was when the Power was used. Target's resolve.

name: Charm
description: Target becomes charmed by you. Targets resolve.
op_1_desc: 2 EN for each additional creature you cause them to become charmed by. These additional creatures must be within the range of this Power.
op_2_desc: If the target is hostile toward you, they gain +5 to their resolve to resist this effect. +2 EN for each decrease of this bonus by 1.

name: Immune to Take-Over
description: Target is immune to having their actions or movement be controlled or decided by another entity. If target already had this condition it gains +5 on rolls to overcome it.
op_1_desc: #ERROR!

name: Immune to Frightened
description: Target is immune to the frightened condition. If target already had this condition it gains +5 on rolls to overcome it.
op_1_desc: #ERROR!

name: Immune to Charmed
description: Target is immune to the charmed condition. If target already had this condition it gains +5 on rolls to overcome it.
op_1_desc: #ERROR!

name: Frighten
description: Target becomes frightened. Targets resolve.

name: Mark Creature
description: Whenever you deal damage to the target creature you may add 1d2 to that damage. Targets resolve.
op_1_desc: +2 EN for each additional 1d2.

name: Command Movement
description: You choose how a target uses 1 action point worth of the movement action or interaction as long as it's not directly harmful such as making a target run off a cliff.
op_1_desc: +4 EN for each additional action point to a maximum of 3.

name: Wall
description: Create a wall that is one space long and a half meter wide. The wall's evasion is 0 and has 5 Health but cannot be critically hit. Each space of the wall has its own Health. The wall can be shaped however you'd like with its provided amount of spaces including in a rounded shape. If the wall is created in the same space as a creature, the creature must roll Reflex against your potency or be placed on a side of the wall that you choose. If they succeed, they may choose which side to end up on. If this Power deals damage it is only dealt if the creature fails this save or somehow transverses a space of the wall (including through breaking it and moving through it's space before the damage duration ends).
op_1_desc: 1 EN to add 2 Health to the wall segments.
op_2_desc: +1.5 EN to add 1 space to the wall's length.

name: Block
description: Block an attack by making a Power roll to hit, using the roll as your new evasion. This replaces your regular evasion for the attack, and you must use the result. This part cannot be lingered.

name: Power Armor
description: Create Power armor on target. Power armor negates 1 damage from physical and Power damage. Adding damage to Power armor gives it the 'spiked' property, with the damage from spikes being the added damage. Elemental damage that is less effective against the element of the armor does half damage, while elemental damage that is effective against the armor type ignores its damage reduction. Power armor lasts 4 hours.
op_1_desc: +4 EN, +1 TP for each increase of 1 damage reduction, to a maximum of 10 including armor already worn.
op_2_desc: +4 EN, +1 TP for each additional 4 hours of duration.

name: Reflect
description: When you are the target of an-Area of Effect Power, you may cause the creator of the Power to become the target instead, using your Power attack roll up to a certain energy amount of the reflected Power. Decide how much energy cost you wish to be able to reflect.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN per 2 EN of the Power being reflected.

name: Deflect
description: When you are the target of an-Area of Effect Power, you may choose a new target for the Power, using your Power attack roll up to half the range of the original Power. Decide how much energy cost you wish to be able to deflect.
op_1_desc: 1 EN per 2 EN of the Power being reflected.

name: Counter
description: Cause the target Power in range to end immediately. Decide how much your Power can end before using, i.e. you decide your Power can negate 30 EN and below Powers. This makes the cost of deflect 4 + 20 (1.5 of 30).
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN per 2 EN target spent on Power.

name: Absorb
description: Absorb energy from the target Power. Every 2 EN the user paid for that Power costs +1.5 EN to absorb. If you're unable to pay the full cost of the Power to absorb, you absorb up to the amount you have but still get affected by the Power. If the Power deals damage, you may reduce that damage by 1 for every 2 EN absorbed. You gain all absorbed energy at the end of your turn.
op_1_desc: Every 2 EN the user paid for that Power costs +1.5 EN to absorb.

name: Negate
description: 1.5 EN per 2 EN target spent on Power. When a Power under the energy negation of this Power target's you, it has no effect. Decide how much your Power can end before using, i.e. you decide your Power can negate 30 EN and below Powers. This makes the cost of negate = 15 + 1.5*15 (half of 30) which equals 37.5.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN per 2 EN target spent on Power.

name: Dispel
description: Target a Power that has already been used, and has a duration longer than one round in an attempt to end that Power. If the Power you're attempting to dispel has more energy cost than you can dispel, you can instead attempt a Power attack roll against it in an attempt to dispel it, with a DS equal to 10 +1 for each 10 Energy that Power cost.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each 2 EN of the Power being ended.

name: Permanent Dispel
description: No Powers can be used in or pass through the area while this Power occupies it. Any magical items become mundane while they occupy the same space as this Power. Any Power that is lingering or exists in the area is dispelled.

name: Blessed
description: Target gains 1d2 to overcome when targeting others and when they target you (other than increasing evasion).
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional +1d2.

name: Resistance
description: Target creature gains resistance to one damage type for the duration. You must choose the damage type when creating the Power.
op_1_desc: +4 EN, +1 TP for each additional damage type resistance.

name: Minor Resistance
description: Once each turn when you take a chosen non-physical damage type (Bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing), you reduce that damage by 1d2.
op_1_desc: +0.5 EN for each additional 1d2.

name: Evasion Buff
description: Increase target's evasion by +1.
op_1_desc: +3 EN for each additional +1 evasion.

name: Ward
description: Target has -1 on D20 rolls and Potencies against you. Targets your choice of resolve, mental fortitude, or discernment.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional -1 decrease.

name: Sanctuary
description: When a creature target's the target of this Power they must overcome your potency with resolve or be forced to choose a new target.

name: Condition Resistance
description: Target gains +1 to overcome a specified condition.
op_1_desc: +1 EN for each additional +1.

name: Condition Immunity
description: Target gains immunity to a specified condition. If you already have the condition you lose it.
op_1_desc: +4 EN & 1 TP for each additional condition.

name: Connected Creatures
description: A willing target is connected to you. Whenever it would take damage it takes half of that damage and you take the other half (after applying that target's resistances and damage reduction[s]).
op_1_desc: +7 EN & 1 TP: Target's 1 unwilling creature and 1 willing creature. Whenever the willing creature would take damage it takes half of that damage and the unwilling creature take's the other half (after applying the willing target's resistances and damage reduction[s]).

name: Impassible Aura
description: Create an area that has a 1 space radius. No creature can enter that space for the Power's duration, if the area is moved to occupy the same space as a creature then this Power ends.

name: Power Resistance
description: Target gains +1 to overcome any Power that target's them.
op_1_desc: +6 EN for each additional +1.

name: Power Damage Resistance
description: Target gains resistance to all damage dealt by Powers.

name: Fall Resistance
description: Reduce target's fall damage by 1/2.
op_1_desc: +4 EN to reduce fall damage to 0 instead.

name: Cylinder of Effect
description: 25% EN: Add a cylinder of effect with a 1-space radius and a 2 space height centered on yourself or a point within range that you can see. The power affects all targets within this area. Roll one attack against all targets' relevant defense.
op_1_desc: 25% EN: Increase the radius by +1 or to increase the height by 4.

name: Sphere of Effect
description: 25% EN: Add a sphere of effect with a 1-space radius centered on yourself or a point within range that you can see. The power affects all targets within this area. Roll one attack against all targets' relevant defense.
op_1_desc: 25% EN: Increase the radius by +1.

name: Trail of Effect
description: 25% EN: Each space directly between you and this Power's target is affected for the Power's duration. A creature that begins its turn in one of these spaces must roll the relevant defense against your potency or become affected.

name: Pierce Targets on Path
description: Each object occupying a space between you and the Power's target takes 1d2 magic damage.
op_1_desc: #ERROR!

name: Add Multiple Targets
description: Target an additional creature within range. Make one attack and damage roll, applying it to both targets, splitting the total damage between them. Any other power effects only target one of the chosen creatures.
op_1_desc: +1 EN For each additional target.

name: Expanding Area of Effect
description: 50% EN: At the end of your turn after the round in which Power was used, its area of effect increases 1 space in all directions.

name: Target One in an Area of Effect
description: -25% EN: When you first use this Power and at the beginning of the turn the Power was used, you can choose one creature within its area of effect to target with the Power. The Power can only target and affect creatures in this way. You don't need to see a target to make it the target of the Power. Can only be applied to Powers with Area of Effect greater than one space

name: Exclude Area
description: You may choose to exclude certain parts within an area of effect of this Power from being affected.

name: True Magic Damage
description: Add +1 magic damage to the Power. Targets evasion by default.
op_1_desc: 1.5 EN for each additional +1 magic damage.

name: True Light Damage
description: Add +1 light damage to the Power. Targets fortitude by default.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional +1 light damage.

name: True Physical Damage
description: Add one physical damage type to your Power (Piercing, Slashing, or Bludgeoning). This adds +1 of that type to the Power's damage. +1.5 EN for each additional 1 damage of this type dealt. +2 EN, +1 TP to apply more than one of these damage types to the Power (this cost does not increase the damage). Targets evasion.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional +1 damage of this type.
op_2_desc: 2 EN, +1 TP to apply more than one of these damage types to the Power (this cost does not increase the damage).

name: True Elemental Damage
description: Add +1 elemental damage type to your Power (Fire, Ice, Lightning, or Acid). This automatically adds +1 to the Power's damage. +1.5 EN for each additional 1 damage of this type dealt. +2 EN, +1 TP to apply more than one element to the Power (this cost does not increase the damage). Targets evasion.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN for each additional +1 damage of this type.
op_2_desc: 2 EN, +1 TP to apply more than one element to the Power (this cost does not increase the damage).

name: True Poison or Necrotic Damage
description: Add 1 Poison or Necrotic damage targeting fortitude. +1.5 EN per each additional +1 damage of that type.
op_1_desc: +1.5 EN per each additional +1 damage of that type.

name: True Sonic Damage
description: Add 1 Sonic damage targeting fortitude. +2 EN per each additional +1 sonic damage.
op_1_desc: +2 EN per each additional +1 sonic damage.

name: True Spiritual Damage
description: Add 1 Spiritual damage targeting resolve. +2 EN per each additional +1 spiritual damage.
op_1_desc: +2 EN per each additional +1 spiritual damage.

name: True Psychic Damage
description: Add 1 Psychic damage targeting mental fortitude. +2 EN per each additional +1 psychic damage.
op_1_desc: +2 EN per each additional +1 psychic damage.

name: Controlled Damage
description: Split damage into additional dice of the same value. +1 EN for every additional die added.
op_1_desc: +1 EN for every additional die added.

name: Long-Linger Damage
description: Choose a damage type. Each round, the creature takes 1d2 damage of that type for at the beginning of each turn for the duration. Targets Fortitude for all damage types except Psychic, which targets Mental Fortitude. This part cannot have a duration of less than 2 rounds.
op_1_desc: +2.5 EN for each additional +1d2.

name: Siphon
description: Choose a damage type, target loses 1d2 Health, energy, or both as that damage. You decide how much to drain from each resource (Health/EN) after rolling and accounting for reductions, resistances & weaknesses. If one resource is insufficient, the siphon automatically draws from the other. At the end of the turn, you regain Health and/or EN equal to what was siphoned, with siphoned energy giving you energy, and health giving you health (up to 10 points gained total). This part cannot have a duration of more than 1 round. Targets Fortitude. You do not add your Power Attack Bonus to this Power's damage, and the damage is reduced by armor no matter the type.
op_1_desc: #ERROR!

name: Damage Siphon
description: When you damage a creature, you heal or regain energy at the end of the turn, equal to half the damage dealt (up to 10 points of Health/EN regained). This part cannot have a duration of more than one round.
op_1_desc: +1 EN and +1 TP to increase the maximum regained by +2.

name: Power Infused Strike
description: Add your Power Bonus to the attack and damage rolls you make with a melee or ranged weapon that is part of this Power. You must be proficient with that weapon.

name: Mend
description: This Power repairs a single break or tear in an object, like a broken chain link, two halves of a shattered key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 30 centimeters in any dimension, you mend it seamlessly, leaving no trace of the prior damage. This can physically restore a damaged magic item but cannot reinstate any lost magical properties.

name: Minorly Manipulate Air
description: You generate a breeze strong enough to ripple fabric, stir dust, rustle leaves, and close open doors and shutters, all within a one-space cube. Doors and shutters that are held open by a person or object remain unaffected.

name: Minorly Manipulate Earth
description: You create a thin layer of dust or sand that spreads over surfaces in a one and a half meter square area, or you inscribe a single word in your handwriting in a patch of dirt or sand.

name: Minorly Manipulate Water
description: You conjure a spray of cool mist that lightly dampens creatures and objects within a meter and a half cube. Alternatively, you create one cup of clean water, either in an open container or on a surface, which evaporates after 1 minute.

name: Minorly Manipulate Fire
description: You produce a thin cloud of harmless embers and colored, scented smoke within a one space cube. You determine the color and scent, and the embers can ignite candles, torches, or lamps in the area. The smoke's fragrance lingers for 1 minute.

name: Minorly Manipulate Elements
description: You shape dirt, sand, fire, smoke, mist, or water that can fit within a 30-centimeter cube into a crude form (such as that of a creature), which holds its shape for 1 hour.

name: Tremors
description: The ground vibrates harmlessly in a rhythm or continuously, as you choose, within the entire range of the Power for one minute.

name: Invisible Force
description: You instantly cause an unsecured door or window to burst open or slam shut or another harmless effect briefly manipulating a movable unsecured object.

name: Detached Sound
description: Create a sound that is localized at a point within range such as ominous voices, a birds crow, or the distant sound of thunder.

name: Booming Voice
description: Your voice amplifies to up to three times its normal volume for 1 minute. During this time, you gain +1 on Intimidation skill rolls using Charisma.
op_1_desc: +1 EN to increase these skill rolls by +1.

name: Altered Eyes
description: Alter the color or appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

name: Flavor
description: Give a normal or somewhat unique flavor to up to one cubic half meter of food or liquid.

name: Fire Manipulation
description: You instantly ignite or extinguish a small flammable object such as a candle, torch, or small campfire.

name: Plant Manipulation
description: Slightly manipulate a plant by causing it to bud, bloom, grow a centimeter, wither slightly, change flower color to a different flower color or change leaf color to match a different season and so on.

name: Chill or Warm
description: Warm or chill up to one cubic half meter of material, food or liquid.

name: Mark
description: You cause a color, a small mark, or a symbol to manifest on an object or surface taking up no more than half a square meter for a duration of 1 hour.

name: Clean or Soil
description: Instantly clean or soil an area no larger than half a cubic meter.

name: Sensory Effect
description: Create a harmless sensory effect, such as cascading leaves, ethereal dancing fairies, a soft breeze, the sound of an animal, or a faint scent, soft musical notes or another noise. The effect must fit within a 1 space cube.

name: Tiny Creation
description: You conjure a non magical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It remains until the end of your next turn. A trinket cannot deal damage and has no monetary value. It lasts 1 minute.

name: Weather Sense
description: You know what the weather will be like within the next 24 hours within 5 kilometers.

name: Understand Language
description: Understand all written and audible langugages for the duration.

name: Tongues
description: Gain proficiency in a chosen language for the duration.

name: Light
description: Add bright light out to 2 spaces, with an additional 2 spaces of dim light. Bright light is considered unobscured, while dim light is lightly obscured for creatures relying on sight. If this is the only Power part, the light lasts for 1 minute. The light can linger on a person, object, or in range in the air depending on the Power.
op_1_desc: +1 EN to increase bright and dim light by 2 spaces each.

name: Thought
description: Add a simple thought, idea, or memory to the Power. Conditions for receiving or understanding this idea are set upon Power creation. A thought not delivered to a target can take small physical form to signify its presence in an area, lingering until a full recovery. This form cannot be larger than a one-space flat surface. +2 EN to increase the space it can occupy.
op_1_desc: +2 EN to increase the space it can occupy to one cubic space or 1 additional space of flat surface.

name: Distant Message
description: Send a message that only that creature can hear to any creature you are aware of that is at most 6 seconds of length. The creature can choose to block this Power's ability to send them messages after they receive the first message, creature's who do this cannot be contacted this way until they've had a full recovery or choose to allow messages.

name: Breathe
description: Target can breathe normally despite an environmental factor that would prevent it (e.g., underwater, a realm without air, or a water breathing-only creature without water). You must choose the environmental factor upon creating the Power.

name: Ping
description: Upon a set condition, you receive awareness of a specific event within the area where this Power is used (e.g., a rune being touched, a thought being received or read, a creature entering an area, or a creature succeeding/failing a potency roll from your Power). This effect persists in an area up to 1 space large until a full recovery.
op_1_desc: +3 EN for this to last up to 30 days.

name: Audio
description: Add a sound to your Power. This sound can only cause damage if sonic damage is added. The sound is audible within a 6-space radius.
op_1_desc: +0.5 EN for each additional 3 spaces of audition.

name: Create Food
description: Create enough rations for 1 creature to avoid malnutrition. The rations are bland but look how you'd like them to. The food spoils if uneated in 24 hours but remains in existence. This food has no currency value.
op_1_desc: +4 EN For each additional ration.

name: Create Water
description: Create up to 5 liters of clean water, enough to avoid dehydration for 1 creature. 5 liters of water can wet a creature or surface that occupies 1 space.
